name: Sacrifices must not be made
description:
You and your fellow slime have been naughty for the year and it’s Christmas! The villagers are out to sacrifice you two to Krampus and make sure that this Christmas will be a great one! Show the world that sacrifices don’t have to be made!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/sacrifices-must-not-be-made-ld-43
